text: Paris Volley is a professional Volleyball team based in Paris. It plays in Pro A. ==History== Paris Volley was founded in the 1998 from the fusion of the volleyball section of the Paris université club (PUC) and the Paris Saint- Germain Racing Volley. ==Palmarès== Award ceremony 2014 CEV Cup *CEV Champions League (1) ** Winner : 2001 *CEV Top Teams Cup (2) ** Winner : 2000, 2014 *CEV Challenge Cup (1) ** Winner : 2000, *Pro A (9) ** Champion : 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2016 *Coupe de France (4) ** Winner : 1999, 2000, 2001, 2004 *Supercoupe de France (2) ** Winner : 2004, 2006 ==Current squad== {|cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 95%;
